'Cangjie programming language_exception_exception_classes': 'In Cangjie code language, Cangjie has two main exception classes: Error and Exception.
Error:
Represents internal system errors and resource exhaustion errors.
Main functions:
open prop message: String: Returns detailed information about the error.
open func toString(): String: Returns the error type name and detailed information.
func printStackTrace(): Unit: Prints stack trace information to the standard error stream.
Exception:
Represents logical errors or IO errors during runtime.
Main functions:
init(): Default constructor.
init(message: String): Constructor that sets the exception message.
open prop message: String: Returns detailed information about the exception.
open func toString(): String: Returns the exception type name and detailed information.
func getClassName(): String: Returns the user-defined class name. Subclasses need to override this method to return their own name.
func printStackTrace(): Unit: Prints stack trace information to the standard error stream.'
